alert.note: Alert for Central Arctic Plains (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 10:33AM AKST until January 14 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility expected. East winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times with whiteout conditions possible. * WHERE...North of Sagwon. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS..Plan on difficult travel conditions. Blowing snow will cause whiteout conditions. Snow drifts will form.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for blowing snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
